channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hertz’s stock was flat this year. Now billionaire Bill Ackman is driving it higher.
item.description: Bill Ackman’s Pershing Square Capital buys $46 million in Hertz’s stock, which is rallying 17%.

item.title: Goldman Sachs downgrades Target, citing growth concerns
